text:
System wide is pretty simple: REG.exe ADD
"HKLM\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsCopilot" /v
TurnOffWindowsCopilot /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f I'm testing disabling this crap in
Edge. It's buried in so many places and the key at HKLM doesn't turn them all
off and is treated (and functions as) a completely different animal. This should
do the Edge stuff, but I haven't tested yet: REG.exe ADD
"HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge" /v HubsSidebarEnabled /t REG_DWORD /d 0
/f -S
Link: None

metadata.topic: Windows 10 will be able to join in the fun of Copilot
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Windows 10 will be able to join in the fun of Copilot
